name: 6th Edition of World Congress on Infectious Diseases
content: We cordially invite you to participate in the "6th Edition of World Congress on Infectious Diseases (Infection 2024)", scheduled to be held in Paris, France from JUNE 24-26, 2024\. The theme of this event is "Eradicating Infectious Disease Through Ascension in Research." The Infectious Diseases Conferences 2024 serve as an exceptional platform for researchers, scientists, and experts in the field of Infection Conferences 2024 to convene and explore the latest advancements in treatment. This event will feature an Vaccines Conferences offering a unique opportunity to learn about innovative approaches in various aspects of | Infectious Diseases Conferences 2024, including healthcare, virology, epidemiology, infection prevention, and more. Attendees will have the chance to share their knowledge and experiences, engage in discussions about the latest breakthroughs, and establish potential collaborations. Conference Full Name: 6th Edition of World Congress on Infectious Diseases Conference Short Name: INFECTION 2024 Conference Theme: “Eradicating Infectious Disease Through Ascension in Research” Dates: JUNE 24-26, 2024 Conference Venue: Paris, France Event Mode: Hybrid Event: Both Onsite and online versions / Virtual Reach us at: Contact Email: infectious@magnusconference.com Phone: +1 (702) 988 2320 WhatsApp: +17794292143 Dates: JUNE 24-26, 2024 Website: https://infectiouscongress.com Abstract submission: https://infectiouscongress.com/submit-abstract Registration: https://infectiouscongress.com/register Social Media Link: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InfectionDiseaseConf Twitter: https://twitter.com/InfectionEvent YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLtH0EIiRfFWaIOwuYL5IEw Organiser: Magnus Group LLC -
